name: Universal Protocol Token
description: UPT is a transformational development for the entire blockchain industry allowing all cryptocurrencies to be convertible on a single network. We are an alliance of like-minded cryptocurrency companies and blockchain pioneers. Our mission is to bring 100 Million new users into cryptocurrency. Our technology, the Universal Protocol Platform, is a transformational development for the entire blockchain industry, allowing new types of digital assets to be created and all cryptocurrencies to be convertible on a single network.
